turkish_example_sentence: O güzel şarkı sözlerini sevgilisine romantik restoranda söylemiş olsaydı evlenirlerdi
english_example_sentence: If he had said the beautiful song lyrics to his beloved in the romantic restaurant they would have gotten married
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он сказал красивые слова песни своей возлюбленной в романтическом ресторане, они бы поженились
